ygData.subject: Re: Wrath of the Mighty
ygData.msgSnippet: Tyrael was surprised. Tyrael: Destroyed? The two of them? By the Ancestors, Unicron will be so mad! We ve got to finish the gun before he comes. Deathstar, go

Tyrael was surprised.

Tyrael: Destroyed? The two of them? By the Ancestors, Unicron will be 
so mad! We've got to finish the gun before he comes. Deathstar, go 
fetch someone from Maximal base to help you and Dreadplague build it. 
Go.

He thought for a moment, frowning.

Tyrael: What about your newfound bot, Darkangel? Have you had time to 
analyze him or learn anything about him?


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Darkangel/DeathStar : :
> 
> Darkangel returned to the base with the bot he found. He placed the 
bot in a CR tank. He would check on him in a while.
> 
> DeathStar also arrived back at base. Just before landing there had 
been traces of an incoming comm message but the jammers were still in 
place.
> 
> Both bots arrive at Tyrael's location.
> 
> Darkangel: Darkangel, reporting. The Maximals have defended 
themselves. Unicron's minions have been destroyed. Rodimus has agreed 
to the alliance. They are preparing. Also, I dound a crashed bot on 
the way back. He is currently in the CR tank.
> 
> DeathStar: The platform for the weapon has been constructed, sir.
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Bloodblade weakly grumbled. What was incredible with him was that, 
> after all the damage he'd taken, he was still not in stasis lock, 
> simply passed out.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > : : Darkangel : :
> > 
> > Darkangel finds Bloodblade and decides to take this bot with him. 
> Angel carefully picks up the injured bot and takes off, in bot 
mode, 
> for the Tripred base.
> > 
> > 
> > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Bloodblade had survived entry, but he was awfully damaged. His 
> armor 
> > was charred and stripped away at some places, and molten at 
others. 
> > He was in definite need for CR.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > : : Darkangel : :
> > > 
> > > While in flight, returning to the Tripredacus base, Darkangel 
saw 
> > Bloodblade come down. He alters course, landing at the touch down 
> > spot, in bot mode.
> > > 
> > > Darkangel: That looked like a bot that went down, not a ship. 
How 
> > could any being survive the atmospheric entry?
> > > 
> > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > Bloodblade, orbiting Earth disguised as a pod, got a 
confirmation 
> > > that Rockseeker and Lunekill were both terminated. Reluctantly, 
> he 
> > > decided to warn his Master.
> > > 
> > > Bloodblade: Master Unicron, Rockseeeker and Lunekill have just 
> been 
> > > terminated.
> > > 
> > > The response was immediate and terrible. He was attacked both 
in 
> > his 
> > > body and in his spark, even though his Lord was at the other 
end 
> of 
> > > the system. Tendrils of electricity shook him, causing 
> > interferences 
> > > that could be picked up from Earth.
> > > 
> > > In the middle of his agony, he heard a thundrous voice inside 
his 
> > > head.
> > > 
> > > Unicron: Incompetent Minions! They have failed me. Now, 
> Bloodblade, 
> > > it is your turn to go, but I have learned from this.
> > > 
> > > When the pain stopped, he had forgotten who he was or who he 
> > served. 
> > > He only remembered his name. He started spinning wildly as he 
> > entered 
> > > high orbit and was attracted to the ground.
> > > 
> > > A few minutes later, he crashed loudly into the ground, exactly 
> at 
> > > the same distance from the three bases.
> > > 
> > > 
> > >
